original_title: Schools to close for a 39-day long holiday
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The first phase of the third term of 2023 ends on Friday (22), for government and government approved private schools.
The second phase of the third school term begins on the 1st of February, 2024, giving students a 39 day long school holiday.
Plans are in place to hold the GCE Advanced Level Examination during this period.
The Ministry of Education said the A/Level Exams will be held from the 4th to the 31st of January, 2024.
The Education Ministry added the first school term of 2024 will begin on the 19th of February.
